official_title: To amend the Library Services and Construction Act to authorize grants for library and information technology enhancement.
short_title: Library and Information Technology Enhancement Act of 1989

summary.text: Library and Information Technology Enhancement Act of 1989 - Amends the Library Services and Construction Act to direct the Secretary of Education to make grants to States which have had approved long-range and annual State plans and programs required by such Act for library and information technology enhancement programs. Requires that such program be administered in the Department of Education by an expert in library technology. Authorizes appropriations for FY 1990 through 1992.

titles.title: Library and Information Technology Enhancement Act of 1989
To amend the Library Services and Construction Act to authorize grants for library and information technology enhancement.
